name: Daily Scrum
description: A short meeting for the team to discuss progress, blockers, and goals for the day.

block.name: Team Status Update
block.description: Each team member provides an update on their progress since the last meeting.

questions.question: What did you work on yesterday?
What will you work on today?

name: Sprint Retrospective
description: A reflective meeting where the team discusses what went well, what didn’t, and what can be improved in the next sprint.

block.name: Reflect your opinion
block.description: Each team member provides feedback on what went well, what didn’t, and what can be improved in the next sprint.

reflectColumns.title: What went well?
reflectColumns.instruction: Express your opinion on what went well during the sprint.

reflectColumns.title: What didn’t go well?
reflectColumns.instruction: Express your opinion on what didn’t go well during the sprint.

reflectColumns.title: What should be improved?
reflectColumns.instruction: Express your opinion on what should be improved in the next sprint.

name: Morning Sync
description: A quick meeting to align the team on the day's objectives, challenges, and support needs.

block.name: Progress Review
block.description: Each team member provides a brief update on their progress and priorities for the day.

questions.question: What task are you focusing on today?
Is there any help you need from the team?
Are you on track with your current task?

block.name: Impediment Identification
block.description: A quick check-in for any potential blockers that need to be addressed.

questions.question: Do you foresee any blockers today?

name: Sprint Reflection
description: A meeting to reflect on the sprint, discuss achievements, challenges, and plan improvements.

block.name: Team Achievements
block.description: Each team member shares one thing that went well during the sprint.

questions.question: What was one achievement you are proud of this sprint?

block.name: Areas for Improvement
block.description: Identify areas where the team can improve based on the sprint's experiences.

questions.question: What part of the process can we improve?
What hindered your work or slowed you down?

block.name: Actionable Items
block.description: Define specific actions that can be taken to improve the team's performance in the next sprint.

questions.question: What can we do differently in the next sprint to improve?

block.name: Sprint Reflection
block.description: Reflect on various aspects of the sprint, including successes, challenges, and improvements.

reflectColumns.title: What went well?
reflectColumns.instruction: Reflect on what worked well during the sprint.

reflectColumns.title: What didn't go well?
reflectColumns.instruction: Reflect on the challenges or failures encountered during the sprint.

reflectColumns.title: What can we improve?
reflectColumns.instruction: Reflect on what the team could have done better.
